A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I often thought I just like gloomier sci-fi.  That can't be it however\, since I liked Guardians Of The Galaxy quite a bit.  It must simply come back to that same old dichotomy between pandering and sharing.  I.e. Between \"here\, those dumb assholes should love this\" and \"I fucking love this\, others should too\".
